casebody.data:
Shenitha COMB, et al., petitioners,
v.
Ron ROWELL, Superintendent, Benji's Special Educational Academy, Inc., et al. No. 13-348. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 2, 2013.

Case below, 538 Fed.Appx. 371, 2013 WL 5913615.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
